br.uff.midiacom.ana.link
Class NCLBind<B extends NCLBind,R extends NCLRole,N extends NCLNode,I extends NCLInterface,D extends NCLDescriptor,P extends NCLParam>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.link.NCLBind<B,R,N,I,D,P>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, java.lang.Comparable<B>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLBind<B extends NCLBind,R extends NCLRole,N extends NCLNode,I extends NCLInterface,D extends NCLDescriptor,P extends NCLParam>
extends NCLElement
implements java.lang.Comparable<B>

Esta classe define o elemento bind da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define um bind de um elo de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
